24 LITTLE ASIA ON THE HILL The undergraduate student body at the University of California, Berkeley, is 41 percent Asian. Other elite colleges are also admitting high numbers of Asian students. Some ask, are those numbers too high? Others, are they high enough? By Timothy Egan
